name: 99acrescomKnowledgeCentre
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Read the latest news and articles, expert columns, analysis on buying, selling, renting in the Indian real estate market on 99acres.com Knowledge Centre. Access insights on top Indian property markets and information on top trends in residential, commercial, retail/hospitality sectors of India.

Founded in 2005 by InfoEdge (India) Ltd, 99acres.com is India’s No. 1 real estate e-portal with 7 lakh unique visitors every month and over 10 lakh property listings. It is the most trusted platform for lakhs of buyers, over 5,000 builders, 30,000 brokers and 2 lakh owners to buy, rent and sell properties in India. 

The platform is leveraged with a cutting-edge technology to showcase virtual tours, 3D tours, latest price trends and analysis of all major cities across India, virtual project tours, verified listings and property walk-throughs. The key differentiator is the approach to not only operate as a property listing website, but also as a platform to inform, educate and share the relevant and critical data, analysis and information about various projects and localities. 

99acres.com also has a highly engaged community forum called Ask and Answer– India’s top real estate forum in which over 1000 real estate experts are available to advice buyers take informed decisions. In addition, the platform also covers latest news, buying guides, detailed insight reports of top cities and annual reports to give the best projection of the market.

While catering to the shift in user interaction, 99acres.com has revolutionised the real estate industry by launching mobile app (Android & iOS) in 2011. The app is also recognized as the Best and Innovative App in 2015 by GSF Accelerator. 

In addition, 99acres.com has won various awards and accolades such as: 

- Amity Corporate Excellence Award
- Most Admired Real Estate Portal by CMO ASIA Awards 2012
- Best Real Estate Portal by BCI Awards 2012
- Best Online Realty Portal by Accommodation Times Awards 2012

99acres.com employs highly-skilled employees, who are dedicated to offer assistance to its customers in quick turnaround time. With the availability of over 1.53 lakh residential projects and maximum verified listings on the e-portal, the company has become the one-stop-solution for all real estate needs!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
